thread.title: J Murphy
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by J Murphy

author: J Murphy
title: J Murphy
text: I've been shopping B&H for years. They have a great selection of electronics, computers and video/photography equipment with great prices. I recently purchased a Macbook Pro from them, it was top-of-the-line and less expensive than any other store. Check them out before buying from the big box retailers or other online stores.
